name: ​Escape the planet
description:
Escape the planet was made, by two people (the art and animation is done by Zhiris and the coding and sounds by Jenk.), in about 3 hours each for Trijam #190: The 3 hour game jam

In this game you must find the four pieces of your broken ship and escape the planet! However, you are not alone. Shoot your way through hordes of enemies and get out at whatever cost! 

We hope you enjoy Escape the planet!

Controls: 

- Aim with the mouse

- Left mouse button to shoot

- Move with ASDW

This game can also be played with a controller:

- Aim with the right stick

- Right trigger to hoot 

- Move with the left stick
